'''''Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees''''' is a [[World Quest]] in [[Gavireh Lajavard]], [[Sumeru]]. It is part of the {{Quest|Pale Fire}}.

World Quest Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (Madinat al-Nuhas) Start Location Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Steps==
# Let Sorush awaken the residual Pari in the [[Fravashi Tree]]
# Talk to the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree
# Look for the residual Pari fragments scattered around (0/3)
# Talk to the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|The residual Pari residing within the Fravashi Trees are still trapped in obsessions of the past. It seems that Sorush can awaken them...}}
{{Transclude|Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (North Tunigi Hollow 1)|first meet|section=1}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the Fravashi Tree)
:'''Paimon:''' That tree over there... That's a Fravashi tree, isn't it?

;(Talk to the Pari)
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' *sob* *sob*
:'''Paimon:''' Hey, what's wrong? Is there anything we can do to help?
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' *sob* Everyone's lost here... If only we could go back together... *sob*

;(Talk to the Pari again)
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' *sob* *sob* Where's everyone...

;(Talk to the Pari after collecting the fragments)
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' Hehe, thank you so much! We can finally go home.
{{Dialogue End}}
{{Transclude|Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (North Tunigi Hollow 1)|first clear|section=1}}
